terms.title: Terms and conditions
terms.content:
User agreement for the mobile application "Gingy"

Definitions
1.1 “App” means the Gingy mobile application.
1.2 "User" means the individual or legal entity using the application.

User data
2.1 The user grants the application the right to collect, store and process working time data in accordance with the privacy policy.

data usage
3.1 The application uses user data solely for the purpose of tracking work time and providing a gamification experience.
3.2 The application does not transfer users’ personal data to third parties without their consent.

Time counter and gamification
4.1 The User agrees to the use of a time counter and gamification elements to stimulate productivity.
4.2 The application may provide bonuses and rewards in accordance with the results achieved.

User Responsibilities
5.1 The User undertakes to provide accurate and up-to-date data for correct tracking of working hours.
5.2 The user is responsible for the security of his credentials.

Responsibility
6.1 The application is not responsible for possible data losses or problems associated with using the application.
6.2 The application does not guarantee uninterrupted operation and may be temporarily unavailable due to technical problems.

Changes to Terms of Use
7.1 The application has the right to make changes to the user agreement with notification to the user.

Termination of use
8.1 The user has the right to stop using the application at any time.
8.2 The application has the right to terminate the provision of services if the user violates the terms of the agreement.

Applicable right
9.1 This user agreement is governed by the laws of the Russian Federation.


By accepting the terms of this agreement, the user confirms his agreement with its provisions and undertakes to comply with them in the process of using the "Gingy" application.

privacy.title: Privacy and Policy
privacy.content:
Privacy Policy for the mobile application "Gingy"

Collection and use of information
1.1 Gingy collects information about the user's working hours in order to provide tracking and gamification functions.
1.2 Data collected includes periods of activity, duration of work, and information about goals achieved.

User data
2.1 When using "Gingy", the user grants the application the right to collect, store and process personal data necessary for the correct functioning of the application.
2.2 "Gingy" does not transfer the user's personal data to third parties without the user's consent.

data usage
3.1 The collected data is used solely for the purpose of providing the user with application functionality, such as tracking work time, providing statistics and gamification experiences.
3.2 Gingy may use anonymized data to improve the quality of the service and develop new features.

Data Security
4.1 Gingy takes measures to ensure the security of user data, including data encryption and the use of information security tools.

Data access and management
5.1 The user has the right to request access to his personal data, make adjustments or delete them.
5.2 The user can manage privacy settings within the application.

Privacy Policy Updates
6.1 "Gingy" has the right to make changes to the privacy policy by notifying the user.

User consent
7.1 By using "Gingy", the user agrees to the terms of this privacy policy.

By accepting the terms of this privacy policy, the user confirms his agreement with its provisions and undertakes to comply with them in the process of using the Gingy mobile application.

mobile.subject: Your {app_name} Mobile App Credentials
mobile.body:
We are excited to welcome you to the {company_name} company! As you embark on your journey with us, here are your mobile app credentials:

Email Address: {user_email}
Password: {user_password}

To start using the {app_name} mobile app, please follow these simple steps:

  1. Download the App: Visit your device's app store and download the {app_name} app if you haven't already. You can find it by searching for "{app_name} App."
  2. Open the App: Launch the app on your mobile device.
  3. Log In: Use the provided email address and your temporary password to log in to your {company_name} account within the app.
  4. Change Your Password: For security reasons, we recommend changing your temporary password immediately after your first login. Choose a strong, unique password that only you know.

We're excited to have you as part of the {app_name} company and look forward to the contributions you'll make. Your presence enriches our company, and together, we'll achieve great things.

change_email.subject: Change email verification
change_email.body: We've received a request to change the email address associated with your account. To complete this process and ensure the security of your account, please verify your new email address by clicking the link below:
change_email.outro:
If you didn't request this change, please ignore this email.

Verification Link Expiry: {time} hour
change_email.email_change_sent: A verification email was sent to the new email address.

reset_password.subject: {app_name} Mobile App Password Reset
reset_password.body:
We hope this message finds you well. In response to your request to reset your password for the {app_name} mobile app, we have generated a new password for you.

Your updated login credentials are as follows:

Email Address: {user_email}
New Password: {new_user_password}

Please follow these steps to log in:

  1. Open the {app_name} mobile app on your device.
  2. Use the provided email address and the new password to log in to your {company_name} account within the app.
  3. For security reasons, we recommend changing your password after your first login. Choose a strong, unique password that only you know.
We appreciate your prompt attention to this matter.

reset_password.subject: Reset password
reset_password.body: We have received a password reset request associated with this email address. If this was you and you would like to reset your password, please visit the following link:
reset_password.outro:
If you have not submitted a password reset request, please ignore this message. Your account will remain secure.

If you have any questions or need further assistance, do not hesitate to contact our support team.

globals.button_fallback_text: If you are having trouble clicking the "{action_text}" button, please copy and paste the URL below into your web browser: <a href="{action_url}" target="_blank" class="break-all">{display_url}

between.array: The :attribute must have between :min and :max items.
between.file: The :attribute must be between :min and :max kilobytes.
between.string: The :attribute must be between :min and :max characters.

gt.array: The :attribute must have more than :value items.
gt.file: The :attribute must be greater than :value kilobytes.
gt.string: The :attribute must be greater than :value characters.

gte.array: The :attribute must have :value items or more.
gte.file: The :attribute must be greater than or equal to :value kilobytes.
gte.numeric: The :attribute must be greater than or equal to :value.
gte.string: The :attribute must be greater than or equal to :value characters.

lt.array: The :attribute must have less than :value items.
lt.file: The :attribute must be less than :value kilobytes.
lt.string: The :attribute must be less than :value characters.

lte.array: The :attribute must not have more than :value items.
lte.file: The :attribute must be less than or equal to :value kilobytes.
lte.numeric: The :attribute must be less than or equal to :value.
lte.string: The :attribute must be less than or equal to :value characters.

max.array: The :attribute must not have more than :max items.
max.file: The :attribute must not be greater than :max kilobytes.
max.numeric: The :attribute must not be greater than :max.
max.string: The :attribute must not be greater than :max characters.

min.array: The :attribute must have at least :min items.
min.file: The :attribute must be at least :min kilobytes.
min.string: The :attribute must be at least :min characters.

password.letters: The :attribute must contain at least one letter.
password.mixed: The :attribute must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
password.numbers: The :attribute must contain at least one number.
password.symbols: The :attribute must contain at least one symbol.
password.uncompromised: The given :attribute has appeared in a data leak. Please choose a different :attribute.

validation.accepted_if: The :attribute must be accepted when :other is :value.
validation.active_url: The :attribute is not a valid URL.
validation.after: The :attribute must be a date after :date.
validation.after_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date after or equal to :date.
validation.alpha_dash: The :attribute must only contain letters, numbers, dashes and underscores.
validation.alpha_num: The :attribute must only contain letters and numbers.
validation.before: The :attribute must be a date before :date.
validation.before_or_equal: The :attribute must be a date before or equal to :date.
validation.boolean: The :attribute field must be true or false.
validation.date: The :attribute is not a valid date.
validation.date_equals: The :attribute must be a date equal to :date.
validation.date_format: The :attribute does not match the format :format.
validation.declined_if: The :attribute must be declined when :other is :value.
validation.digits_between: The :attribute must be between :min and :max digits.
validation.distinct: The :attribute field has a duplicate value.
validation.email: The :attribute must be a valid email address.
validation.ends_with: The :attribute must end with one of the following: :values.
validation.filled: The :attribute field must have a value.
validation.in_array: The :attribute field does not exist in :other.
validation.ip: The :attribute must be a valid IP address.
validation.ipv4: The :attribute must be a valid IPv4 address.
validation.ipv6: The :attribute must be a valid IPv6 address.
validation.json: The :attribute must be a valid JSON string.
validation.mac_address: The :attribute must be a valid MAC address.
validation.mimes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation.mimetypes: The :attribute must be a file of type: :values.
validation.multiple_of: The :attribute must be a multiple of :value.
validation.prohibited_if: The :attribute field is prohibited when :other is :value.
validation.prohibited_unless: The :attribute field is prohibited unless :other is in :values.
validation.prohibits: The :attribute field prohibits :other from being present.
validation.required_array_keys: The :attribute field must contain entries for: :values.
validation.required_if: The :attribute field is required when :other is :value.
validation.required_unless: The :attribute field is required unless :other is in :values.
validation.required_with: The :attribute field is required when :values is present.
validation.required_with_all: The :attribute field is required when :values are present.
validation.required_without: The :attribute field is required when :values is not present.
validation.required_without_all: The :attribute field is required when none of :values are present.
validation.starts_with: The :attribute must start with one of the following: :values.
validation.doesnt_start_with: The :attribute may not start with one of the following: :values.
validation.timezone: The :attribute must be a valid timezone.
validation.url: The :attribute must be a valid URL.
validation.uuid: The :attribute must be a valid UUID.
validation.youtube_url: The :attribute is not a Youtube URL
